about_the_game:
Esper Agent is a game about esper secret agents, where a group of girls from an agency receive a mission to infiltrate the cities of a large corporation and stop their evil plans.

Players can choose one of several unique agent girls to take part in the mission. During the game, you'll need to dodge waves of enemy bullets while attacking and using special abilities to defeat enemies and reach the goal.

Shooting Mechanics

Players can choose a weapon for combat. As you progress, you'll collect various parts to modify your weapon, increasing its damage or enhancing its effects. Each weapon has different bullet capacity limits and reload times, so you’ll need to manage reload windows carefully to maximize your damage output.

Mastering Your Abilities

To advance and thwart the corporation's conspiracy, players must grow stronger step by step by leveraging their agent’s abilities and weapons. This includes using genetic chips to enhance your powers, weapon parts to improve your arsenal, and skill rings to adapt to different situations.

Infiltration Missions

The route you choose for each infiltration will affect the journey ahead. By selecting the most relevant paths and exploring for rewards, you’ll increase your chances of successfully reaching the final destination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32/64bit or greater
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX650 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: As a Esper agent, infiltrate from the outskirts to the city center and defeat the final boss to stop the conspiracy. Strengthen yourself with genetic enhancements and parts, and master your weapons and superpowers to succeed.
